caption.p: Toxicity on brine shrimps ( Artemia salina) by EOs of M. pulegium leaves (MPLI, MPLII, and MPLIII) and flowers (MPFI, MPFII, and MPFIII) at 48 h. Potassium bichromate (50 μg/mL) was used as a positive control (CTR+). Results are the mean of three independent experiments ± standard deviation ( n = 10). * p < 0.001 vs. MPLI; § p < 0.001 vs. MPFI; §§ p < 0.05 vs. MPFI ° p < 0.001 vs. MPLIII; # p < 0.05 vs. MPFIII; ψ p < 0.001 vs. all sample concentrations except MPLI and MPFI.
